ModMetaData.name: Biotech Prestige Mechlord Armor 1.4
ModMetaData.author: Phonicmas
ModMetaData.description: A prestige version of the mechlord armor that i quickly threw together by recolouring the original armor and modifying stats. It counts as prestige armor for all those pesky royals out there, and gives a slight increase in bandwitdh and same psychic bonuses as other prestige armor. If you have any suggestions for it or a better sprite for that matter let me know.
